title: An elegie offer'd up to the memory of His Excellencie Robert Earle of Essex and Ewe Viscount Hereford, Lord Ferrers of Chartley, Bourchier and Lovaine, late generall of the Parliaments forces. / Thomas Philipot.
author: Philipot, Thomas, d. 1682.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed for William Ley at his shop in Pauls Chaine,
